extendedInfo.description: AndroIbex. Your Spanish stock alerts.With AndroIbex alarms you can get all the values ââof the Spanish market. When an index reaches the selected limit, AndroIbex sends a notification to the notification bar of your Android device.Features:- Optimized for minimum battery consumption to be integrated with the operating system alarm.- You can set the interval between checks to match the state of your battery.- You can even turn off alerts from the setup menu with a single click and use the application to check the status of the market.- User friendly, clear and simple, style-oriented Android menus.- The data are provided by Yahoo Finance a few minutes late.- IBEX 35 , Mercado Continuo, Mercado Alternativo BursÃ¡til ( MAB )- Version 1.70Coming soon:- Graph of evolution.- Context menu options "Major" and "Minor"- ...
